description.ruby-sapphire:
Allures the foe to reduce
evasiveness.
description.emerald:
Allures the foe to reduce
evasiveness.
description.firered-leafgreen:
Allures the foe to
reduce evasiveness.
It also attracts
wild POKéMON.
description.diamond-pearl:
A sweet scent that
lowers the foe’s
evasiveness. It also
lures wild Pokémon
if used in grass, etc.
description.platinum:
A sweet scent that
lowers the foe’s
evasiveness. It also
lures wild Pokémon
if used in grass, etc.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
A sweet scent that
lowers the foe’s
evasiveness. It also
lures wild Pokémon
if used in grass, etc.
description.black-white:
A sweet scent that lowers the opposing
team’s evasiveness. It also lures wild
Pokémon if used in grass, etc.
description.black-2-white-2:
A sweet scent that lowers the opposing
team’s evasiveness. It also lures wild
Pokémon if used in grass, etc.
description.x-y:
A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing
Pokémon’s evasiveness. This also lures wild
Pokémon if used in places such as tall grass.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing
Pokémon’s evasiveness. This also lures wild
Pokémon if used in places such as tall grass.

effect.full: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.
